text: Ra tiniharumadhye kehi yasta pani chan jasale ki yasa uddesyale masjidako nirmana gare taki hani purya'un ra kuphrako kura garun, ra mominaharuma kalaha srjana garun ra tiniharuko lagi sadhana juta'un jasale aghi allaha ra usaka rasulako virodha garisakechan ra kiriya khanchan ki hamro uddesya ta matra bhalo garnu thiyo, tara allaha saksi cha ki tiniharu jhutha chan
